My Work Experience

Here are some of the projects I worked on...

Java Developer

De Volksbank - July 2017 till Sept. 2018

Within the domain Klant Wil Betalen of the Volksbank there are a number of projects for which development capacity is required. One of them is Payment Service Directive 2, in short PSD2. A directive for which the EU wants to create a uniform payment market by establishing a single legal framework for payment transactions within the EU. The Volksbank must also comply with this EU directive.

CGI has delivered a scrum team to the Volksbank to work on this project. Jonathan is part of this scrum team. During the PSD2 project, Jonathan focused on the communication between the frontend and the backend. His activities include creating REST APIs and writing tests for the new functionality.

The PSD2 project was delivered on time and with good quality. The customer was satisfied with Jonathan's commitment. Following the PSD2 project Jonathan worked as a fullstack developer on a new project Payment Request.

Tools and techniques: IntelliJ, Jira, Confluence, Java, JUnit, Maven, Git, AngularJS, Scrum, Cucumber / Protractor, Jasmine, Postman, SQL.

SharePoint Developer

Shell - Feb. 2016 till April 2018

During this period Jonathan was assigned to Shell as a SharePoint developer. He was part of the SharePoint Solution Factory team. Its role is to ensure that SharePoint sites are set up correctly, in alignment with Shell standards and Enterprise plans. His responsibilities are namely to:

  • Configure SharePoint Sites, Lists and Libraries
  • Developing custom web parts
  • Permission provisioning on sites, lists & libraries
  • Creating SharePoint 2010/2013 workflows & Powershell scripts
  • Content migration using ShareGate
  • Delivering support to customers

Tools and techniques: IntelliJ, Jira, Confluence, Java, JUnit, Maven, Git, AngularJS, Scrum, Cucumber / Protractor, Jasmine, Postman, SQL.
